data.oai_dc:dc: Water Levels from the Taylor Slough, Everglades National Park, South Florida from August 1999 to December 2004
Water level is recorded at least hourly at TS/Ph2 and TS/Ph3. Water level is measured with acoustic water level gages that digitally record relative water height relative to the local soil surface.
water level|Taylor Slough|Everglades National Park|long-term monitoring|abiotic|hydrology|wetland inundation regimes|1999|2003
